text:
"If Keanu is happy, then I am happy." Everyone is happy for Keanu Reeves - he appeared at the evening with artist Alexandra Grant
05 Nov 2019, 15:21 by Meduza
Keanu Reeves is a favorite of the Internet, who has never been married (well, almost). In one of the interviews in 2019, which was recognized as fake, the actor from The Matrix and John Wick 3 was credited with the following words: â€œAre you talking about romantic love? You know, I'm a lonely guy. There is nobody in my life. But if this happens, I will respect and love this person. I hope this happens to me. â€
According to journalists, Keanu Reeves has not been seen in public with her companions for more than 10 years. But last weekend, November 2, the 55-year-old actor came to the Art + Film gala evening at the LACMA Museum in Los Angeles with 46-year-old artist and long-time business partner Alexandra Grant. They have known each other since at least 2011.


ğŸ˜»ğŸ˜»ğŸ˜»Meduza

Over the past few months, their joint photographs have appeared in the media. Life & Style has now announced that Reeves and Grant are dating. â€œEveryone is delighted that he finally found happiness with such a wonderful woman,â€ the source said. But neither the actor nor his representative confirmed this information.
However, this did not prevent netizens from being happy for Keanu Reeves.


â€œKeanu has a girlfriendâ€



â€œIf Keanu is happy, then I am happyâ€



â€œListen. While Keanu is happy, I am happy. "



â€œNo doubt, Keanu Reeves and his girlfriend Alexandra Grant look like a cool cyberpunk couple. It makes sense"



â€œOf course, Keanuâ€™s girlfriend suits him by age. He is a good person"



â€œIn this house we love, support and respect Keanu Reeves and Alexandra Grantâ€


But wait a minute ...
